summary: This mod adds an OP Battleaxe into the game. You can buy it from Warmaidens in Whiterun (and from  Adrianne at the forge).
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]DESCRIPTION///////////////////////////

This mod adds an OP Battleaxe made by [u]SHOR, THE CREATOR OF NIRN[/u] into the game!!! You can buy it from Warmaidens in Whiterun (and from  Adrianne at the forge).

If you cannot get the Battleaxe for some reason or it's too expensive, post the issue to me and I will make an update with a fix.
Meanwhile, open the console (button above tab), type " player.additem 0d000d63 1 " (without quote marks) and check your inventory for the Battleaxe of Shor! (should hopefully be there!)

If you think the price is too high, just ask for and update with a specified price! (I have only just started playing Skyrim again so I'm not very good with the whole value system)


INSTALLATION/////////////////////////

Easy as extracting the contents of the 7z to your Skyrim\Data folder ;)


[/size][size=5]EXTRA INFO////////////////////////////////[/size]


[size=4]THIS IS MY SECOND MOD - I AM BOUND TO HAVE COMPLAINTS![/size]
author: Reece Charlton
